CPSC340.title: CPSC 340 Machine Learning and Data Mining
CPSC340.info: Models of algorithms for dimensionality reduction, nonlinear regression, classification, clustering and unsupervised learning; applications to computer graphics, computer games, bio-informatics, information retrieval, e-commerce, databases, computer vision and artificial intelligence.

MATH152.title: MATH 152 Linear Systems
MATH152.info: 2D and 3D geometry, vectors and matrices, eigenvalues and vibration, physical applications. Laboratories demonstrate computer solutions of large systems. Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.

MATH200.title: MATH 200 Calculus III
MATH200.info: Analytic geometry in 2 and 3 dimensions, partial and directional derivatives, chain rule, maxima and minima, second derivative test, Lagrange multipliers, multiple integrals with applications. Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.

STAT200.title: STAT 200 Elementary Statistics for Applications
STAT200.info: Classical, nonparametric, and robust inferences about means, variances, and analysis of variance, using computers. Emphasis on problem formulation, assumptions, and interpretation. See the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion Lists: www.calendar.ubc.ca/vancouver/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.

CPSC260.title: CPSC 260 Data Structures and Algorithms for Computer Engineers
CPSC260.info: Design and analysis of object-oriented programs, emphasizing data structures. Topics include: classes, interfaces, fundamental data structures, algorithmic complexity, basic debugging and testing techniques.

APSC160.title: APSC 160 Introduction to Computation in Engineering Design
APSC160.info: Analysis and simulation, laboratory data acquisition and processing, measurement interfaces, engineering tools, computer systems organization, programming languages. Credit will only be given for one of: APSC 160, CPSC 301, or EOSC 211.

CPSC210.title: CPSC 210 Software Construction
CPSC210.info: Design, development, and analysis of robust software components. Topics such as software design, computational models, data structures, debugging, and testing.

MATH101.title: MATH 101 Integral Calculus with Applications to Physical Sciences and Engineering
MATH101.info: The definite integral, integration techniques, applications, modeling, infinite series. Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.

MATH100.title: MATH 100 Differential Calculus with Applications to Physical Sciences and Engineering
MATH100.info: Derivatives of elementary functions. Applications and modeling: graphing, optimization. Consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.
